job_responsibilities: ['Level 2, Application Support EngineerYour WorkAs a member of Ascend Commerce Technology team, you will be a key contributor as a Level 2 Application Support Engineer responsible customer success of leading edge enterprise and consumer facing products servicing a variety of critically important use cases in B2B and B2C. You will have the opportunity to work hand in hand with a truly cross functional matrix organization.Your Profile – Who you are:You are a result driven technical person that craves solving real world problems helping people through digital transformations. You are a naturally energetic, structured and creative person. You have a history of sticking with tough problems and love solving them with your team. You demonstrate go-getter attitude to drive solutions to problems. You are able to foster teamwork, promote team collaboration and communication, and gauge project progress. Your team expects you to be personable, use respectable manners, maintain stable composure, demonstrate a positive attitude, able to work under pressure and has multi-tasking capabilities.Your Duties:Investigate technical support issues raised by the client and swiftly provide a workaround/resolution within the required SLACoordinate with other technical teams (service & infrastructure teams, software development, and 3rd-party vendors) in troubleshooting and resolving service incidents following the defined incident management processGather and analyze information from different sources (e.g. application and system logs, monitoring tool, etc.) to troubleshoot problemsEscalate software defects to development and follow-up for solution/fix to resolve support ticketsConduct knowledge sharing sessions for other team members to improve their technical knowledge and skillsParticipate in post-incident review to identify the root cause of a service disruption and preventive actions, and prepare an incident summary report to stakeholders Provide on-call support during non-business hours and weekends (on rotation basis)Provide on-site support upon requested (for a couple days per week in Pattanakarn area)Your Experience and ']
job_qualifications: [" in:Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science/Information Technology or related fields.Minimum 3-year experience in application support, esp. e-commerce web applicationStrong problem investigation/troubleshooting skillHand-on experience with Unix/Linux platformAbility to communicate in English (reading/writing/speaking) is a mustGood knowledge in web development technology (HTML, JavaScript, CSS, web services)Experienced in using system and application monitoring tools like Prometheus, Nagios or AppManager is nice to haveMature; self-motivated; able to work independentlyAble to work under pressure "]
job_description: Level 2, Application Support EngineerYour WorkAs a member of Ascend Commerce Technology team, you will be a key contributor as a Level 2 Application Support Engineer responsible customer success of leading edge enterprise and consumer facing products servicing a variety of critically important use cases in B2B and B2C. You will have the opportunity to work hand in hand with a truly cross functional matrix organization.Your Profile – Who you are:You are a result driven technical person that craves solving real world problems helping people through digital transformations. You are a naturally energetic, structured and creative person. You have a history of sticking with tough problems and love solving them with your team. You demonstrate go-getter attitude to drive solutions to problems. You are able to foster teamwork, promote team collaboration and communication, and gauge project progress. Your team expects you to be personable, use respectable manners, maintain stable composure, demonstrate a positive attitude, able to work under pressure and has multi-tasking capabilities.Your Duties:Investigate technical support issues raised by the client and swiftly provide a workaround/resolution within the required SLACoordinate with other technical teams (service & infrastructure teams, software development, and 3rd-party vendors) in troubleshooting and resolving service incidents following the defined incident management processGather and analyze information from different sources (e.g. application and system logs, monitoring tool, etc.) to troubleshoot problemsEscalate software defects to development and follow-up for solution/fix to resolve support ticketsConduct knowledge sharing sessions for other team members to improve their technical knowledge and skillsParticipate in post-incident review to identify the root cause of a service disruption and preventive actions, and prepare an incident summary report to stakeholders Provide on-call support during non-business hours and weekends (on rotation basis)Provide on-site support upon requested (for a couple days per week in Pattanakarn area)Your Experience and Qualification in:Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science/Information Technology or related fields.Minimum 3-year experience in application support, esp. e-commerce web applicationStrong problem investigation/troubleshooting skillHand-on experience with Unix/Linux platformAbility to communicate in English (reading/writing/speaking) is a mustGood knowledge in web development technology (HTML, JavaScript, CSS, web services)Experienced in using system and application monitoring tools like Prometheus, Nagios or AppManager is nice to haveMature; self-motivated; able to work independentlyAble to work under pressure

Product Manager–True Money True Money is the leading fintech start-up in SE Asia.Started in 2013 with its HQ in Bangkok, Thailand, we are now operational in Indonesia, Philippines, Vietnam, Cambodia, Myanmar and of course Thailand!We are part of the CP Group, Thailand’s largest private conglomerate.Our investors include Ant Financial(Alibaba Group), who also collaborate with us on technology.The Role You will be lead the vision, strategy and execution of one of our product verticals across our 6 countries(Vietnam, Cambodia, Philippines,Myanmar, Indonesia and Thailand).You will be working with best-in-class colleagues in a dynamic environment. You will conceptualize, launch and manage products across the SE Asia region, collaborating with other product managers and designers.You will manage the roadmap for your vertical, analyze customer journeys, define requirements, set timelines and lead a cross-functional team through Product Development Lifecycle.What you’ll doIdentify opportunities and problems areas for your product linesValue based prioritization of continuous improvements and new features alikeDevelop a deep understanding of your customers, using various tools and methods, to continually gather and analyze qualitative and quantitative data.Research competitive offerings across the region and deliver a best in class experience to your customers.Define and monitor objective success metrics for your products.Translate the opportunities into high quality and detailed Product Requirements in collaboration with the design and development teams.Partner with the engineering team to execute the requirements and see it to smooth launch.Who you areYou have experience working as a product owner, or similar, in high performing, cross functional teamsYou have a technical understanding of what it takes to build and maintain large scale applications and services and you are comfortable facilitating and participating in the architectural and technical decisions made in the team You know how to inspire, motivate and support a team to get things doneYou can translate your and your teams knowledge and experience to user stories and detailed requirementsYou are good at communicating concepts and ideas to stakeholders at all levels.You know how to influence decision-making at all levels within an organization, and in a variety of situations. You have experience with data driven product development and knowledge of agile methodologiesYou work well with uncertainties and tight timelines.You love what you do.

job_responsibilities: ['       PRTR Technical is looking to speak with a Head of IT to work with an international supply chain business located in Bangkok.As the Head of IT, you will be responsible for leading the overall operations of the business ranging from Infrastructure, ERP, WMS, etc. You will aim to understand the business needs & translate these into effective IT solutions for the business & its customers.Responsibilities:Establishing professional channels to understand business needs & challenges.Working with both internal local & regional teams & external customers for the design of supply chain IT solutions.Leading a multi-functional IT team across infrastructure / WMS / ERP development.Managing the IT projects in Thailand whilst also coordinating with the regional teams on these projects.Being responsible for overall IT management in Thailand whilst ensuring IT systems are aligned with the global IT operations.']
job_qualifications: ['s: 5+ years working in a senior IT management role.Experience in a global IT team whilst coordinating with different regions & countries.Good knowledge of ERP systems such as SAP, AX or Oracle.Strong experience working in a 3PL / supply chain environment.Strong leadership, people management andteam development skills.Excellent command of English, both spoken and written.This role as the Head of IT will suit an individual who has strong expertise in the supply chain industry and a thorough understanding of supply chain technology.If this opportunity sounds of interest then please reply with your most up-to-date CV as we are short-listing for this role immediately. ']
job_description: PRTR Technical is looking to speak with a Head of IT to work with an international supply chain business located in Bangkok.As the Head of IT, you will be responsible for leading the overall operations of the business ranging from Infrastructure, ERP, WMS, etc. You will aim to understand the business needs & translate these into effective IT solutions for the business & its customers.Responsibilities:Establishing professional channels to understand business needs & challenges.Working with both internal local & regional teams & external customers for the design of supply chain IT solutions.Leading a multi-functional IT team across infrastructure / WMS / ERP development.Managing the IT projects in Thailand whilst also coordinating with the regional teams on these projects.Being responsible for overall IT management in Thailand whilst ensuring IT systems are aligned with the global IT operations.Qualifications: 5+ years working in a senior IT management role.Experience in a global IT team whilst coordinating with different regions & countries.Good knowledge of ERP systems such as SAP, AX or Oracle.Strong experience working in a 3PL / supply chain environment.Strong leadership, people management andteam development skills.Excellent command of English, both spoken and written.This role as the Head of IT will suit an individual who has strong expertise in the supply chain industry and a thorough understanding of supply chain technology.If this opportunity sounds of interest then please reply with your most up-to-date CV as we are short-listing for this role immediately.

รายละเอียดตำแหน่งงานออกแบบ พัฒนาระบบฐานข้อมูลและปรับปรุงโครงสร้างฐานข้อมูล เช่น ข้อมูลการตลาด การเก็บข้อมูลต้นทุนการผลิตและการผลิตสินค้าต่างๆเขียนโปรแกรมจัดทำฐานข้อมูลต่างๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง เช่น ฐานข้อมูลลูกค้า คู่แข่ง ข้อมูลการผลิตของโรงงานต่างๆ เพื่อให้เกิดการใช้งานที่มีประโยชน์จัดการกับฐานข้อมูลและจัดระบบข้อมูลการขายรายวันและรายเดือนและข้อมูลอื่นๆรวมทั้งพัฒนารูปแบบรายงานให้มีประสิทธิผลต่อการใช้งานด้วยการใช้ Tool BI ได้วิเคราะห์ และ ให้คำปรึกษาในการใช้งาน Tool BI หรือ Report เพื่อให้ user ในองค์กรสามารถใช้งานได้อย่างถูกต้องให้ความร่วมมือในการดำเนินกิจกรรมที่เป็นนโยบายขององค์กรให้บรรลุตามวัตถุประสงค์และเป้าหมายที่กำหนดปฏิบัติตามกฎระเบียบขององค์กร เพื่อให้การดำเนินงานเป็นไปตามวัตถุประสงค์ขององค์กรเสนอแนะหรือให้ข้อคิดเห็นในการปรับปรุงสภาพการทำงานให้ปลอดภัยหรือลดความสูญเสียจากการทำงานต่อผู้บังคับบัญชาหรือผู้เกี่ยวข้องงานอื่น ๆ ที่ผู้บังคับบัญชามอบหมายคุณสมบัติปริญญาตรีสาขาสถิติประยุกต์มีประสบการณ์วิเคราะห์ข้อมูล 3 ปีขึ้นไปมีประสบการณ์ในธุรกิจค้าปลีก 3 ปีขึ้นไปมีความรู้ทางด้านการเขียนโปรแกรม อย่างน้อย 1 ภาษามีความรู้ทางด้าน Databaseมีความรู้ทางด้าน Data Relationalสามารถใช้ Tableauมีความสารมรถใช้ Tool BI อื่นๆ อย่างน้อย 1 ตัวสวัสดิการกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพประกันสุขภาพประกันชีวิตประกันอุบัติเหตุโบนัส (ตามผลงาน)ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปีเบี้ยขยันสวัสดิการเงินกู้ยืมประกันสังคมงานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ประจำปีท่องเที่ยงประจำปีเงินช่วยเหลือเนื่องในโอกาสต่างๆSalary : 30,000 - 45,000 THBสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : สุขุมวิท 71 (แยกคลองตัน)

job_description: Bangkok Bank IT Division is looking for several Blockchain Developer roles. The role is primarily responsible for joining the Blockchain implementation project with R3, other blockchain technology partners. As a developer, you will expand your programming expertise into the new disruptive technologies for the next generation financial industry.You will have an ample opportunity to work with several project stakeholders not only internal but also external which expand your knowledge and networking. The projects will be focusing on how to leverage the disruptive technology like DLT (Distributed Ledger Technology) to enable and streamline business across the supply chain which banking is a part of this value chain.Apart from DLT/Blockchain technology, you will be able to get involve in the application that utilize AI - Machine Learning, Mobile and IoT to make it possible the next generation banking application in the digital economy.Role will report directly to the Vice President of Technology Division and will be play a direct role on creating the Proof of Concept and disseminate the idea and framework to more developers inside our organization and our clients. Responsibilities:Monitor, research and evaluate Blockchain technologiesParticipate in Blockchain/DLT projects with R3 consortium and other Blockchain communityEducate and contribute technology expertise to internal organization with the purpose of innovation disseminationFormulate Technology Strategy and ArchitectureDevelop reference architectures and technology implementations.Work together with internal and external team, clients and consortium to develop a pilot blockchain/DLT project and transition it to the full production.Qualifications:Full stack developer with experience of Blockchain, web, Cross-platform mobile development, API and Security.HTML5, CSS, Java Script with experience in AngularJS or React frameworkStrong Software Engineering skills including Requirement Elicitation, Design Architecture, Technical Design, Coding and Automated TestingExperience in Agile Development with strong discipline and interdisciplinary mindset.Experience in DevOps for Financial Services would be a plus.Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, networking and good communicationEnthusiasm for working in a space full of unknown unknowns, pivoting as needed, and being comfortable with not knowing the end state.Passion for entering Business and Technology AlignmentWorking Location: Bangkok Bank Rama IIIFor more information, please contact K. Apinya Tel. 02-296-8357, 081-985-4446.

job_qualifications: ['sBachelor degree in a related field such as information security, management or computer engineering.Active CISSP & CISM certifications are required.Other relevant certifications (such as GCIH, GCIA, GCFA, GPEN, CEH, GWAPT and others)desirable.Experience working in the Information Security field, including any of the following: threatintelligence, security operations, incident response, malware analysis, and/or vulnerabilitymanagement.Experience with open source and Dark Web intelligence analysis tools.Prior experience in the Service Provider Industry is a plus.Experience operating all areas of the intelligence lifecycle.Experience in collecting intelligence from various information sources including but not limitedto; malware analysis, open source/paid feeds and technical reports.Possess experience in tracking evolving threats and providing threat intelligence support toincident response teams.Excellent problem solving/analytical thinking skills.Demonstrable verbal and written communication skills.Ability to create and provide executive level presentations.Experience in collaborating as part of a larger security/intelligence team.Working experience in a MDR Centre, Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed SecurityService (MSS), or enterprise network environment preferred. job_description: Key ResponsibilitiesEstablishes priority intelligence requirements for all key stakeholdersDemonstrates an understanding of business processes, risk management, and relatedstandards and regulatory requirement. Performs threat modeling to identify, classify, prioritize and rate threats based on thoroughanalysis of the organization’s top risks and critical assets, and derive appropriate use cases tobe implemented into the MDR platform.Investigates and researches known indicators, correlate events, identify malicious activity, anddiscover new sources to provide early warning for a variety of threats. Analyzes internal and external threat intelligence data sets, including vulnerabilitiesintelligence, detect and track emerging threats and security trends. Produces timely, accurate, relevant and predictive intelligence by identifying and reporting onmalicious actors, campaigns, and other relevant activities. Produce and deliver timely, actionable threat intelligence to foster situational awareness,enables proactive decision-making, and promote enhance active defense measures within TrueDigital.Monitors open source information feeds and threat actor activity to identify activity levels andindicators for threats, targets of interest and possible attack vectors. Work with the other MDR Centre team to ensure that actionable indicators of compromise areincorporated into appropriate technologies. Proactively recommends short-term and long-term changes based on threat intelligence toimprove MDR Centre tools and detection capabilities. QualificationsBachelor degree in a related field such as information security, management or computer engineering.Active CISSP & CISM certifications are required.Other relevant certifications (such as GCIH, GCIA, GCFA, GPEN, CEH, GWAPT and others)desirable.Experience working in the Information Security field, including any of the following: threatintelligence, security operations, incident response, malware analysis, and/or vulnerabilitymanagement.Experience with open source and Dark Web intelligence analysis tools.Prior experience in the Service Provider Industry is a plus.Experience operating all areas of the intelligence lifecycle.Experience in collecting intelligence from various information sources including but not limitedto; malware analysis, open source/paid feeds and technical reports.Possess experience in tracking evolving threats and providing threat intelligence support toincident response teams.Excellent problem solving/analytical thinking skills.Demonstrable verbal and written communication skills.Ability to create and provide executive level presentations.Experience in collaborating as part of a larger security/intelligence team.Working experience in a MDR Centre, Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed SecurityService (MSS), or enterprise network environment preferred.

job_qualifications: ['s:Proven experience of working with Vue.JS.Experience with CSS, HTML and Javascript.Experience of working in Agile / Scrum methodology.Bachelor’s Degree within an IT related field.Company Benefits:Food and drink.Performance bonus.Group insurance.Company trip.Flexible working hours.Relax environment.If this role as the Front-End Developer sounds of interest then please reply with your most up-to-date CV as we are shortlisting for this role immediately. job_description: As the Vue.JS Developer you will be building new products to add to already industry leading applications. This role seeks a individual who enjoys to work with the latest technology & who can bring new ideas to improve the customer experience.Responsibilities:Building greenfield products whilst integrating with the current systems & applications.Working in an Agile environment with development teams in different regions across the world.Learning & working with new technology & creating effective uses of this in the business.Researching & trying to implement new technology into the business.Qualifications:Proven experience of working with Vue.JS.Experience with CSS, HTML and Javascript.Experience of working in Agile / Scrum methodology.Bachelor’s Degree within an IT related field.Company Benefits:Food and drink.Performance bonus.Group insurance.Company trip.Flexible working hours.Relax environment.If this role as the Front-End Developer sounds of interest then please reply with your most up-to-date CV as we are shortlisting for this role immediately.

job_responsibilities: [' ถ้าคุณต้องการความท้าทายในการร่วมงานFinTech startupและมีการเติบโตที่รวดเร็วขึ้นทั้งในด้านความรับผิดชอบการพัฒนาอาชีพมาร่วมงานกับเรา!If you want to challenge yourself and join a fast growing Fintech startup with international team, come join us!Job Description:Actual hands-on experiences in C# or JAVA application development with a minimum of 1 year in full project development life cycleExperience with front-end application design and to define application flow and usabilityExperience with data management through SQL commandsFamiliar with necessary reporting tools is a plus']

job_description: ถ้าคุณต้องการความท้าทายในการร่วมงานFinTech startupและมีการเติบโตที่รวดเร็วขึ้นทั้งในด้านความรับผิดชอบการพัฒนาอาชีพมาร่วมงานกับเรา!If you want to challenge yourself and join a fast growing Fintech startup with international team, come join us!Job Description:Actual hands-on experiences in C# or JAVA application development with a minimum of 1 year in full project development life cycleExperience with front-end application design and to define application flow and usabilityExperience with data management through SQL commandsFamiliar with necessary reporting tools is a plusQualification:Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT or equivalent fields1-10 years of experiences in programmingAble to work under pressure with defined deadlines while keeping his/her standard in qualitySelf motivated and have passion to work at a startupInterest in financial technology industryBasic command of written EnglishThai nationality Work location:Sukhumvit 62 (few minutes walking distance from Bang Chak BTS station)

job_responsibilities: [' Rainbowsolutions/ เรนโบว์ โซลูชั่น จำกัดคุณสมบัติปริญญาตรี สาขาคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีความเข้าใจหรือมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับWeb2.0, HTML, CSS, JavaScriptและXMLมีความเข้าใจหรือมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับObject Orientated Programming (OOP)มีความมุ่งมั่น และตั้งใจทำงาน รวมถึงความสามารถในการแก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้สามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้เป็นอย่างดี และประสานงานร่วมกับหน่วยงานภายในและภายนอกได้สามารถเริ่มงานได้ทันที เงินเดือนขึ้นอยู่กับประสบการณ์ และความสามารถ            ']

job_responsibilities: ['Job DescriptionThe BI Analyst is responsible for the design, development, implementation, management and support of mission critical enterprise BI reporting and Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes and environments. Working with cross-functional teams, you will be required together, document, and approve business requirements for data analysis and reporting projects, as well as use BI and database tools to develop reporting solutions to meet business needs.Responsibilities:Business analysis to gather required BI system requirementsTranslate business requirements into specifications that will be used to drive data store/ data warehouse/ data mart design and configurationTransition developed BI systems to the Operations & Support teamProvide support as required to ensure the availability and performance of enterprise data and BI environments for both external and internal users Ensure proper configuration management and change controls are implemented for your sphere of influenceProvide technical assistance and cross training to other team membersDesign and implement technology best practices, guidelines and repeatable processesMust be able to perform duties with moderate to low supervisionRequired']
job_qualifications: ['s:7+ years experience implementing enterprise-scale reporting systems, including : Working with users in a requirements analysis roleExtensive use of SQL and RDBMS systems, preferable on OracleExtensive experience with data warehouse implementations,preferableon Oracle BI EE (OBIEE) and Microsoft PowerBIStrong knowledge of logical and physical data modeling conceptsExcellent interpersonal ( verbal and written) communication skills are required to support working in project environments that include internal, external and customer teams Requires strong analytical, conceptual and problem-solving abilitiesProgramming / scripting experience and knowledge of software development life cycle is preferred.Ability to manage multiple priorities, and assess and adjust quickly to changing prioritiesEnglishcommunication skill ']
job_description: Job DescriptionThe BI Analyst is responsible for the design, development, implementation, management and support of mission critical enterprise BI reporting and Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes and environments. Working with cross-functional teams, you will be required together, document, and approve business requirements for data analysis and reporting projects, as well as use BI and database tools to develop reporting solutions to meet business needs.Responsibilities:Business analysis to gather required BI system requirementsTranslate business requirements into specifications that will be used to drive data store/ data warehouse/ data mart design and configurationTransition developed BI systems to the Operations & Support teamProvide support as required to ensure the availability and performance of enterprise data and BI environments for both external and internal users Ensure proper configuration management and change controls are implemented for your sphere of influenceProvide technical assistance and cross training to other team membersDesign and implement technology best practices, guidelines and repeatable processesMust be able to perform duties with moderate to low supervisionRequiredQualifications:7+ years experience implementing enterprise-scale reporting systems, including : Working with users in a requirements analysis roleExtensive use of SQL and RDBMS systems, preferable on OracleExtensive experience with data warehouse implementations,preferableon Oracle BI EE (OBIEE) and Microsoft PowerBIStrong knowledge of logical and physical data modeling conceptsExcellent interpersonal ( verbal and written) communication skills are required to support working in project environments that include internal, external and customer teams Requires strong analytical, conceptual and problem-solving abilitiesProgramming / scripting experience and knowledge of software development life cycle is preferred.Ability to manage multiple priorities, and assess and adjust quickly to changing prioritiesEnglishcommunication skill

job_responsibilities: ['ResponsibilitiesDevelop program with VB.Net, Net or C#.Net include writing store procedure.Using OOP concepts and UML diagrams based on company standards.Build and deploy application.Works mostly independently within task guidelines established by management.Perform work based on defined process and provide feedback on process improvements as appropriate.Co-operate with team leader in estimation effort, developing plan/schedule and performing tasks according to the plan.']
job_qualifications: ["sBachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science/ Engineering/ Information Technology or related fields.Welcome new graduated or At least 3 years experienceApplicants must have strong VB.Net C#.NET and ASP.NETKnowledge of conception of Object Oriented Design and UML Design.Knowledge of SQL and oracle Command.Knowledge in MySQL, SQL Server, and Oracle database.Eager to learn for new technologies.Able to deal and handle difficult situations and work under time constraints.Can work as a team, must be able to work under extremely high pressure.Proactive, self-motivated, systematic thinking, fast learner and willing to contribute and work as a team.Interested candidates are invited to write in with full resume, stating present and expected salaries, and enclosing a recent photograph to the address below:Hitachi Consulting (Thailand) Ltd.12th Floor,Unit 1202,Q House Lumpini Building, 1 South Sathorn Rd,Tungmahamek,Sathorn,Bangkok 10120 Website:www.hitachiconsulting.com "]
job_description: ResponsibilitiesDevelop program with VB.Net, Net or C#.Net include writing store procedure.Using OOP concepts and UML diagrams based on company standards.Build and deploy application.Works mostly independently within task guidelines established by management.Perform work based on defined process and provide feedback on process improvements as appropriate.Co-operate with team leader in estimation effort, developing plan/schedule and performing tasks according to the plan.QualificationsBachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science/ Engineering/ Information Technology or related fields.Welcome new graduated or At least 3 years experienceApplicants must have strong VB.Net C#.NET and ASP.NETKnowledge of conception of Object Oriented Design and UML Design.Knowledge of SQL and oracle Command.Knowledge in MySQL, SQL Server, and Oracle database.Eager to learn for new technologies.Able to deal and handle difficult situations and work under time constraints.Can work as a team, must be able to work under extremely high pressure.Proactive, self-motivated, systematic thinking, fast learner and willing to contribute and work as a team.Interested candidates are invited to write in with full resume, stating present and expected salaries, and enclosing a recent photograph to the address below:Hitachi Consulting (Thailand) Ltd.12th Floor,Unit 1202,Q House Lumpini Building, 1 South Sathorn Rd,Tungmahamek,Sathorn,Bangkok 10120 Website:www.hitachiconsulting.com

Central Techis a subsidiary of Central Retail Corporation (CRC) - Central Group, Thailand's largest retailer and one of its most well-known brands. Our mission is to assemble the best technology team possible to ensure that Central Group is a leading player in online e-tailing worldwide.Our focus is not just e-commerce as we also enable an omni-channel experience for our customers where we provide the products that they need, no matter where they are. We recruit globally and search for top-tier talent to help us develop our infrastructure and platforms to create an excellent customer experience by allowing access to quality products and services from Central Group anywhere and anytime.What we doThrive to be the best technology organization in the countryBuild cool solutions bringing Central into the futureCreate and agile Technology and business environmentInnovate and team with cool people at startups and tech firmsWe are looking for people who love technology to join our team and help develop a new technology business! We are looking for the following role:Senior Android EngineerResponsibility:Design | Build | Test | Deploy new and enhanced mobile apps & servicesWork closely with Product Management to collaborate on new requirements, applications and featuresWork collaboratively with other SCRUM team members (e.g. server-side developers | web developers) to effectively deliver mobile experiencesWork closely with the QA resources to test, troubleshoot, resolve, and release production applicationsCollaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new featuresWork with a variety of APIs to access critical data for integrationCoach and drive best practicesRequirement3+ years of overall Android developmentStrong Java and Kotlin skills with extensive knowledge of the Android SDK (Kotlin preferred)Proficient in application design pattern and architectureFamiliar with Android Architecture Component and MVVM Design patternBasic knowledge in Android Jetpack componentsStrong in reactive programming pattern (RxJava, RxKotlin, and RxAndroid)Understand the concept of dependencies injectionAble to work collaboratively within a SCRUM team with Agile delivery frameworkSolid understanding of good UI/UX practices and creating high-performance mobile application experiencesAnother cross-platform development is a plus (Flutter, Xamarin, and etc.)Able to work and communicate in EnglishAbility to work in teamWhat we offer:Flexible Working TimeFree-Flow Snacks & DrinksMonthly Team Building BudgetMonthly Lunch AllowanceGet Special Bonus for recommending your friendsTaking your birthday offFree gymFree Udemy online trainingTech Talk & Pizza FridayAnnual Outing & Christmas PartyProject Success CelebrationCareer roadmap for all staffs showing how you can progress.This is an exciting opportunity to work with tech startup company under Central Group –a very strong market presence in Thailand.If this role as the Senior Android Engineer is of interest then please reply with your most up to date CV as we are short-listing for this role immediately.More About Ushttps://www.central.tech/https://www.facebook.com/centraldottech/

Job Description:Research and analyze existing functionalities of the systems/applications, work together with the team to design, develop, test, deploy and technical documents. (Front-end & Back-end).Write unit tests and automated tests.Analysis and solve in Incident & Problem Management Process.Creating, troubleshoot, test and maintain the software and servers/databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality.Work closely collaboratively with Project Manager, Product Owner, Project Leader/Scrum Master/Agile Coach, Solution Architects, Enterprise Architects and others team to deliver the solutions for clients. Research to demonstrate best practice in software development.Job Specification:Bachelor Degree or above in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or related field.At least 5 years’ experience infull stack developer, software development, programming or coding.Able to work with vary method such as waterfall, agile (scrum).Skills in computer language (Java, Javascript, HTML, CSS), Spring Framwork (spring boot, spring MVC, spring JPA), React.JS, Node.JS, ExtJS, Database (SQL), Web application & web service (Restful, SOAP), Git, Maven, JSON, XML, AJAX, Cloud (AWS).Knowledge in Test-Driven Development (TDD).Experience with Agile development methodology such as Scrum and Kanban.Experience in Automation Testing.Can work under pressure, strong communication & negotiation skill, self-learning, self-motivate.Strong/Excellent in English skills (Listening, Speaking, Reading, Writing).

JOB SUMMARY :Under minimal supervision, provide broad and integrated applications programming, systemsprogramming, and management support for company, mission-critical computing on large-scale multi-user production systems, impacting on all MPT factory. Develops and establishes department technical standards and procedures. Serves as a team lead analyst while working with other components to provide a complete applications support infrastructure. Coordinates the work of programming staff, providing technical support, direction, and development. Technically ensures quality software, reliable information, and stable applications for mission-critical company functions.RESPONSIBILITIES :Provide advanced applications support for company, mission-critical computing affecting all campuses; plans, coordinates, integrates, tests, implements, and manages applications and system interfaces. Leads and directs the planning, coordinating, and scheduling of investigations, feasibility studies, surveys, and technical evaluations/decisions on software strategies.Independently designs and implements integrated hardware and software computer and information systems to meet company requirements.Analyses complex, integrated user project proposals; identifies omissions and errors in requirements and conducts feasibility studies; recommends optimum approach and develops systems and/or applications design for approved projects. Develops new and maintains existing complex and critical applications and sub-applications; ensures reliability of cross-company applications.Interprets information and informally arbitrates between system users when conflicts exist.Mentors other technical staff in their areas of specialty.Plans and coordinates the analysis, design, programming, timely implementation, and testing of applications projects.Reviews design, analysis, and code for quality and adherence to standards.Prepares and gives presentations to senior management.Provides on-call support for complex and critical computer applications problems and issues.May serve as lead analyst in a design subgroup, directing and integrating the work of analysts, each responsible for several programs.Maintains currency of knowledge with respect to relevant state-of-the-art technology, equipment, and/or systems.Perform miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned.QUALIFICATIONS :Education Required:Bachelor's degree at least 3-6 years of experience that is directly related to the duties and responsibilities specified.Skill Required:In-depth knowledge of and leadership expertise in at least one of HRMS and Payroll application. (will be consideration)Comprehensive knowledge of multiple computing systems, applications, and Microsoft VB, NET, and Java.Experience in XLM, AJAX, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Asp,Net MVC 2 or 3, Micro Service.Knowledge of current technological developments, NET framework on SharePoint and SQL DB.Demonstrated experiences in areas of object-oriented analysis, and design/development of Web-based application.Knowledge of current technological developments with SQL language for Oracle database.Ability to define application problem by conferring with users, evaluating procedures and process.Ability to assess and maintain quality of programming structure, design, and coding.Ability to plan, design, coordinate installation, test, and modify complex systems and subsystems.Ability to provide technical staff development and performance feedback.Ability to develop and deliver presentations.Team work and willing to learn a new technology.Experience:3 – 6 yearsThe Employment ManagerMagnecomp Precision Technology Public Company LimitedHutchinson Technology Operations (Thailand) Co., Ltd.MPT, Wangnoi, Ayutthaya162 Moo 5, Phaholyothin Road,Tambol Lamsai, Amphur Wangnoi, Pranakorn Sri Ayutthaya 13170, ThailandTel: 0-35215-225 Press 9 Ext. 3813, 3828 Fax: 0-35215-378MPT, Rojana Industrial Park , Zone C1/25 Moo 5, Rojana Industrial Park, Tambol Karnharm, Amphur U-Thai,Pranakorn Sri Ayutthaya 13210, ThailandTel: 0-35215-225 Press 9 Ext. 3813, 3828 Fax: 0-35215-378HTO, Rojana Industrial Park, Phase 850 Moo 4, Rojana Industrial Park, Phase 8Tambol U-Thai, Amphur U-Thai, Pranakorn Sri Ayutthaya 13210, ThailandTel: 0-35334-800 Ext. 4863-4 Fax: 0-35334-822Website:www.magnecomp.com,www.htch.com

รายละเอียดของงาน :Senior Developer  (ด่วน !!)มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการพัฒนา Software ด้วยหลักการ Algorithm, Validation, และ Debugging Concept ด้วย C# .Netมีความเชี่ยวชาญในการใช้ Programming Tool Visual Studioสามาถทำความเข้าใจระบบที่ Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ได้ออกแบบไว้ช่วยเหลือ Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ในการจัดทำเอกสาร Application Specทำความเข้าใจกับ Application Spec จาก Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc)ออกแบบ Technical Function ประสานงาน/ แสดงผลงาน/ รายงานสถานะความคืบหน้าของงาน ต่อหัวหน้าทีมที่รับผิดชอบให้บริการเป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการพัฒนา Softwareทำเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการพัฒนา ดูแล และควบคุมทีมงาน ให้ผลิตผลงานที่ถูกต้อง ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตามเวลาที่กำหนดไว้เป็นที่ปรึกษาการทำงานให้กับทีมงาน ดูแล และจัดการ Resource ที่มี ให้ทำงานที่เหมาะสม และ ทำงานร่วมกันได้อย่างราบรื่น รวมทั้งลดความขัดแย้งที่เกิดขึ้นภายในทีมงานให้บริการเป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการทำงานแบบ Leaderคุณสมบัติผู้สมัครงาน :อายุไม่เกิน 35 ปี จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี หรือปริญญาโทสาขาComputer Science, Computer Engineering, IT, MIS,Business Computer หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ในการเขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา ASP.Net C# อย่างน้อย 2 ปีมีความรู้ในการเขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา ASP.Net C# ระดับดีมีประสบการณ์การทำงานกับ IIS Serverมีความรู้และประสบการณ์การทำงาน ระบบฐานข้อมูล SQL Server และคำสั่ง SQL Statement, Store Procedure ระดับพื้นฐานมีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Web Site Responsive, HTML & CSS, JQuery; JavaScript; AJAX; jSon;มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Web Service - SOAP and RESTมีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนาระบบ (Develop and Program) ในเชิงสถาปัตยกรรม N-Tiers (PT - MT - DT) ระดับดีสามารถวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของลูกค้า และออกแบบโปรแกรมได้ตามหลัก OOP (Object Oriented Programming) ระดับดีมีความรู้และประสบการณ์จัดการ Source Control และ Deploy Applicationมีประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Mobile Application จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Mobile Application ด้วย Xamarin จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีความสามารถและประสบการณ์ในการควบคุมงานของตนเองและทีมงาน ให้ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตามเวลาที่กำหนดไว้สามารถจัดการ, แก้ไขปัญหาของงาน และทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ปรับตัวเพื่อการทำงานร่วมกับทีมงานได้เป็นอย่างดี และช่วยเหลือ แบ่งปัน เพื่อบรรลุจุดมุ่งหมายร่วมกันเปิดใจรับฟังความคิดใหม่ๆ และ มีความเพียรพยายามในการทำงานให้สำเร็จสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : จังหวัด กรุงเทพมหานครอัตราที่รับเพิ่ม 4 ตำแหน่งเงินเดือน40,000 - 70,000 บาทสวัสดิการประกันสังคม ประกันชีวิต, ประกันอุบัติเหตุ, ประกันสุขภาพสิทธิการเบิกค่าทันตกรรม ทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 5 วัน มีเวลาการทำงานที่ยืดหยุ่น ค่าทำงานล่วงเวลา ค่าใช้จ่ายในการเดินทาง, ค่ายานพาหนะ ค่าตอบแทนพิเศษ เงินโบนัสตามผลงาน วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี ท่องเที่ยวประจำ วิธีการสมัครส่งใบสมัครงานผ่านปุ่ม APPLY NOW หรือ ผ่านปุ่มสมัครงานของ JobsDBติดต่อวันทำงาน จันทร์ - job_title: Software  Engineer/วิศวกรซอฟแวร์
job_description: คุณสมบัติถ้ามีประสบการณ์Software ในด้านการจัดการสินค้า จะได้รับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสามารถดูระบบจัดการคลังสินค้าได้ดีวุฒิปริญญาตรี หรือเทียบเท่าประสบการณ์ 0-3 ปีสามารถพูดภาษาอังกฤษ และ/หรือ ภาษาจีน ได้เงินเดือน 15,000.- บาท

ลักษณะงานและหน้าที่:พัฒนา API เพื่อใช้ Integrate กับระบบ Core System หรือ External Systems เช่นจากระบบ Public Cloud หรือระบบอื่นๆ จากภายนอกเข้าใจ แนวคิด การออกแบบทางด้านเทคนิคต่างๆ เกี่ยวกับ Microservicesออกแบบ API และ API Policy ได้ถูกต้องตาม Best Practice และ Security Policyสามารถ Manage API version and จัดทำ API Release Management ได้เรียนรู้และศึกษาการใช้ API Technology ใหม่ๆ ตลอดเวลาคุณสมบัติ:วุฒิปริญญาตรี ขึ้นไป สาขาวิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์, วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์, MIS, IT หรือที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์2+ ปี ด้านการพัฒนา API สำหรับซอฟต์แวร์ มีความรู้ความเข้าใช้ใน API Infrastructure และ Enterprise Service Bus Concept เป็นอย่างดีมีความเชี่ยวชาญในการพัฒนาระบบงานด้วยภาษา Javascript, XML, Java, Python, Node JSมีประสบการณ์พัฒนา Application Security ด้วย JWT, OAuth 2.0, SAML เป็นต้นมีประสบการณ์การใช้ API Management Toolมีทักษะในการสื่อสาร ได้เข้าใจ เข้าประเด็น ไม่หลงประเด็นการสื่อสาร และใช้ภาษาอังกฤษในการสื่อสารได้ดีชอบความท้าทาย และ ศึกษาหาความรู้ใหม่ๆ ทางด้าน Cloud Technology อยู่เป็นประจำทำงานเป็นทีม เข้ากับเพื่อนร่วมงานได้ดี ให้ความร่วมมือในกิจกรรมต่างๆ ภายในบริษัทฯเป็นนักวางแผนและจัดการเวลาได้เป็นอย่างดี มีแผนสำรอง และ มีความยืดหยุ่นเป็นคนที่คิดว่าสามารถหรือพัฒนาตนเอง เพื่อทำงานตามที่เขียนไว้ใน “ลักษณะงานและหน้าที่” ได้จบเรียบร้อยเป็นอย่างดีสามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้เป็นอย่างดี ในแบบให้ความเคารพความเห็น การตัดสินใจเพื่อนร่วมงาน (respectful to others) เพราะการทำงานเป็นทีมนั้นสำคัญมาก ที่จะต้องเข้าใจและเคารพซึ่งกันและกันContact Name:Tangerine Co., Ltd. (YipInTsoi Group)20th Fl., Bangkok Insurance Building, 25 Sathorn Tai Road, Tungmahamek,Sathorn, Bangkok 10120Telephone:02 353-8600 Ext. 2110,02-285-5511 Fax:02 353 8680Home Page:http://www.tangerine.co.th orhttp://www.yipintsoi.com/a_subsidiary.html

job_title: Web Team – Trainee / Intern level PHP
job_description: !Urgently Required !คุณสมบัติผู้สมัครไม่จำกัดเพศ อายุตั้งแต่ 20 -33 ปีการศึกษา:ปวส, ปริญญาตรี (พิจารณานักศึกษาจบใหม่ หรือผู้ที่สนใจฝึกงานเท่านั้น)ทำงานร่วมกับบุคคลอื่นได้ป็นอย่างดีมีทัศนคติที่ดี เห็นอกเห็นใจเพื่อนร่วมงาน มีความรับผิดชอบต่อเนื้องานที่ได้รับมอบงานพูด อ่าน เขียน ภาษาอังกฤษในระดับพอใช้-ดีไม่จำเป็นต้องมีประสบการณ์การทำงาน ขอให้มีใจพร้อมเรียนรู้งานหน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับWordPress, PHP, MySQL พื้นฐาน, CSS, HTMLและ jQueryมีความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับการbackup, restore, migrate WordPress และการCall API พัฒนาเว็บไซต์โดยใช้PHP, Wordpress & Woo-Commerce ,Visual Composer pluginวันทำงาน:จันทร์–ศุกร์ 8.00-17.00 (วันศุกร์เลิกงาน 15.00)สถานที่ปฏิบัติงานอาคารบีบี บิลดิ้ง ถ.สุขุมวิท21(อโศก)จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร**หากคุณแสดงให้เห็นถึงความตั้งใจและมีความมุ่งมั่นที่จะเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ อาจนำไปสู่โอกาสที่ให้คุณได้เป็นพนักงานประจำที่บริษัทฯของเรา**

หน้าที่รับผิดชอบพัฒนาเว็บไซต์โดยใช้ PHP, Wordpress & Woo-Commerce ,Visual Composer pluginมีความเชี่ยวชาญด้าน back-end และ front-end development (Wordpress)มีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับ WordPress, PHP, MySQL พื้นฐาน, CSS, HTML และ jQueryเลือกและติดตั้ง Theme และ Plugin ในการพัฒนาเว็บไซต์ให้ใช้งานได้จริงมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับ Responsive and Parallax websiteมีประสบการณ์ในการ developing E-commerce website โดยใช้ WordPressมีความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับการ backup, restore, migrate WordPress และการ Call APIสามารถเชื่อมระบบการชำระเงินกับ Third party ได้จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษถ้าสามารถใช้งาน Magento ได้คุณสมบัติมีประสบการณ์จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ถ้าไม่มีขอให้มีใจพร้อมเรียนรู้งานสามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษ พูด อ่าน เขียน ในระดับพอใช้ เพราะมีทีมงานบางส่วนเป็นชาวต่างชาติมีทัศนคติที่ดี เห็นอกเห็นใจเพื่อนร่วมงาน มีความรับผิดชอบต่อเนื้องานที่ได้รับมอบงาน

Net framework and Net core.Experience in Java toolchain (Maven, Gradle), creating web services.Familiar with related backend framework - Spring, Hibernate.Experience in version control tool.Experience in CI/CD.Expertise in database framework by using any kind of ORM with Ms SQL or Oracle.Experience in any kind of web-server e.g. IIs, nginx.Unit testing/ automated testing habit.Bachelor in Computer Science/Engineering.Experience in no SQL is a plus.Good to have :More hardcore programming experience, urges to dive into a real programmatic problem not just websites only.RX Java, functional programming.Soft skill :Some year experience with.net (our main backend language) and wish to pick up Java or Node js.strong in problem solving and investigated problem.Ability to organize, prioritize, and work under pressure.Willing to be a team player.Able to communicate in English.Working read/write English proficiencyWhy work with us?Starting with competitive salary but that’s not enough. Our work philosophy is to allow freedom and rely on autonomy. You don’t want other people looking over your shoulders all the time and instructing you like a robot. We operate based on trust and that means time is flexible and life should be as easy as it can be.We are young and energetic people and it’s a lot of fun to work here. Our team describes that the cheery and friendly working atmosphere is one best reasons to work at App Man.--------------------------------------------Don't worry if you just graduated from university. Our Ascend vision is to create life opportunities with innovative digital services. We are blessed to be operating in ASEAN, where we are able to help one of the world’s largest populations of underbanked, the people from some of the poorest provinces who are disregarded by traditional banks. So many lives are waiting for our help.In 2017, we served over 30 million customers in 6 countries (Thailand, Cambodia, Myanmar, Vietnam, Indonesia, Philippines), and processed over 4.5 billion USD. This makes us by far the largest fintech company in SE Asia, and growing quickly.As a member of our esteemed Engineering team, you will be helping to bring this vision to reality by leveraging the most modern cloud-native technologies. At Ascend, you will be part of a team who are directly responsible for improving the lives of millions.Key ResponsibilitiesWork in an agile team to build / develop features and technologies across various aspects of the Java stack, primarily focused on Spring Boot and Spring Cloud / NetflixOSS.CI/CD deployments on a Kubernetes based platform, both on premises and on a multi-cloud infrastructure. (AWS and GCP)Possess an understanding of cloud-native architectures, and be familiar with implementations involving service discovery, circuit breakers, client side load balancing, and other architectural patterns related to elastic infrastructure. Participate in, and help create, a company culture which attracts, retains, and coaches other engineers. The primary deliverable of a senior engineer are more senior engineers.Conduct design and code reviews.Provide specific technology expertise to help drive innovation.Identify emerging technologies to create leading edge banking productsPartnering with architects and platform engineers to build strategies for execution, drive and facilitate key decisions, and influence others and lead change where appropriate.Essential Skills & PrerequisitesA positive, can-do attitude, who naturally expresses a high degree of empathy to others.Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience. We are more interested in passion for technology and what you are capable of, than we are academic qualification. 5 or more years of relevant work experience.Experience in building mission critical applications from scratch, and decomposing monolithic applications into smaller services.Experience with a broad mix of technologies, including a strong subset of:Core Java 8,9, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, NetflixOSSAngular JSKubernetes (or equivalent)MySQL, PostgreSQL, EnterpriseDB, NoSQL (Cassandra, MongoDB, ELK)RabbitMQ, KafkaAWS & GCPAPI GatewayLinuxCI/CD (Jenkins, Git)Experience with distributed architectures, SOA, microservices and Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS).Experience with Agile and Test Driven Development (TDD) methodologies.Familiarity with containers and their technologies such as Docker.Familiarity with container orchestration technologies such as Mesos and Kubernetes.Experience with high availability, high-scale, and performance systems.

job_description: ResponsibilitiesSupporting all network requests, including designing and implementing:Being a Tier2 Network Operation Support.Network Troubleshooting.Network Performance Tuning.Network Capacity Planning and Management.Network Vendor Management.Network Root Cause Analysis.Network Architect, Design, Solution.Ensuring that network diagrams, configurations and inventory are maintained properly.Providing Network Consultant Service.QualificationsMinimum 3 years of experience in Infrastructure Network Design, Implementation, and Operation.A proven track record of successful project implementation/management related to WAN/LAN.Being able to do Network Analysis by using Protocol Analyzer.Experienced with troubleshooting of Windows Server, Virtual Machine, Linux productsITIL foundation is an advantage.VMWare, Microsoft certified is preferred.Good English proficiency both speaking and writing.

Our Ascend vision is to create life opportunities with innovative digital services. Operating in Southeast Asia, we are able to help one of the world’s largest populations of underbanked, the people from some of the poorest provinces who are disregarded by traditional banks. So many lives are waiting for our help.In 2018, we served over 30 million customers in 6 countries (Thailand, Cambodia, Myanmar, Vietnam, Indonesia, Philippines), and processed over 4.5 billion USD. This makes us by far the largest fintech company in SE Asia, and growing quickly.As a member of our talented Engineering team, you will help to bring this vision to reality by leveraging the most modern cloud-native technologies. At Ascend, you will be part of a team who are directly responsible for improving the lives of millionsKey Responsibilities:Work in an agile team to build / develop features and technologies across various aspects of the Java stack, primarily focused on Spring Boot and Spring Cloud / NetflixOSS.CI/CD deployments on a Kubernetes based platform, both on premises and on a multi-cloud infrastructure. (AWS)Possess an understanding of cloud-native architectures, and be familiar with implementations involving service discovery, circuit breakers, client side load balancing, and other architectural patterns related to elastic infrastructure. Participate in, and help create, a company culture which attracts, retains, and coaches other engineers. The primary deliverable of a senior engineer are more senior engineers.Conduct design and code reviews.Provide specific technology expertise to help drive innovation.Identify emerging technologies to create leading edge banking productsPartnering with architects and platform engineers to build strategies for execution, drive and facilitate key decisions, and influence others and lead change where appropriate.Essential Skills & Prerequisites:A positive, can-do attitude, who naturally expresses a high degree of empathy to others.Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience. We are more interested in passion for technology and what you are capable of, than we are academic qualification. 4 or more years of relevant work experience.Experience in building mission critical applications from scratch, and decomposing monolithic applications into smaller services.Experience with a broad mix of technologies, including a strong subset of:Core Java 8,9, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, NetflixOSSRabbitMQAWS (optional)API GatewayLinuxCI/CD (Jenkins, Git)Experience with distributed architectures, SOA, microservices and Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS).Experience with Agile and Test Driven Development (TDD) methodologies.Familiarity with containers and their technologies such as Docker.Experience with high availability, high-scale, and performance systems.

What is C0D1UM?If there's a single quote that defines our company, it's this:I think the only really important criteria for quality in software is: relevance. That is, someone is using it, and it's solving someone's real problem.– Pieter HintjensThe quote above captures the essence of what it means to be a Codium – impact. We pride ourselves in building shit that matters. Shit that is relevant and delivers tangible values. We promise that you will get to use Angular to build stuff that you can brag to your friends about. Our bragging rights includes an Angular 8 app – a football competition system – that has been blessed by FIFA (yes, the global football organization) and is slated to take over (read: deployed to) ASEAN countries in 2021. The best part? This is not your typical startup app that is all hype but no actual users. The app has beenin production for 2 years now.Culture FitIf you don't get excited reading the above paragraph and are wondering if our company provides free lunch and ping pong tables, please stop. Don't apply. Seriously, just go. Away.(For the record, we provide free food (most of the time) but have no ping pong tables. Ping pong tables take too much room and real developers play Xbox or Nintendo Switch anyway. But I digress.)You are not a Senior Code MonkeyYou read that right. We are not a (big) brother corporation looking to hire a Senior Code Monkey (SCM). An SCM is one that, you know, crank out code 24x7 and cannot hold an intelligent, light-hearted conversation with an actual human being.Nay, we actually are a small, close-knit company (45+ people and growing!) that choose to employ people that get excited reading Mr. Hintjens' quote above. Our people also don't consider working from home a company benefit because, dammit! it's more fun working together at the office!Jack of All Trades, Master of AngularThe true perk of working at CODIUM is that you can become the jack of all trades, and are expected to be a master of Angular.At CODIUM, we definitely value your Angular chops. Further, our programmers came from all walks of life, with many of our best programmers coming from reputable companies. Everyone of them gives the same testimonials: at CODIUM, you will get to be the jack of all trades. You won't be just a "frontend guy." Like many before you, eventually you will get this itch that you will need to be more. Because when you work with us, you are just a "frontend guy" until you eventually get stuck with a bug coming from the backend at 11PM on a Friday night and your colleague already went home. This traumatic experience leaves an annoying itch that eventually leads you to learn about Django, and then Docker, and then AI, and then...one day, you wake up and find yourself becoming a Full-stack developer.Needless to say, as a frontend developer, you have an eye for UX/UI. Of course, you can also hold a non-technical, light-hearted conversation with normal humans. Right? ;-)Tech for The Geek In YouTo continue our geek-speak, here comes the buzzword avalanche that should get your blood pumping more than anunlimited vacationperk:AI, TypeScript rocks,JavaScript sucks,Ngrx, Functional programming, Reactive programming, Asynchronous Programming, Django, Python, Full-Stack = Django + Angular, Flutter, PostgreSQL, Kotlin, Swift, AWS, (Smart use of) Microservice, DevOps, Qt, C++20, Git, Sass, Docker, UX/UI, CI/CD.As mentioned in the "Culture Fit" section, you shouldnot apply if all you are looking for is just the typical startup perks. But you shoulddefinitely apply if you have a manic obsession to fix/refactor broken code. You know, itreally bothers you when you see something that is not done right. You shouldreally, definitely, "please, we beg you" toapplyif during the work day, you just randomly get up and start helping others less senior than you with their tasks, but stillget your job donewell and on-time.Before you head to the next section, we should also mention to you that every Codium gets an Amazon Echo Dot. AI is the 22nd century infrastructure. Our team is already living it.Full-Stack DeveloperWhat's more? Many of our Angular developers eventually become a Full-stack developer by learning Python and Django. Did we already mention that Python is one of the most in-demand programming languages of the 21st century?Foreigner friendly, English ReadyCambodian, Welsh, Indonesian, American (the CEO), Burmese, Belgian, Iranian, Portuguese, Indian, and Thai. About 10 more nations and we will change our company's name to "United Codiums." Seriously now, we are a liberal, progressive company that welcomes (and grants the work permit) to any foreigners that fit our core values.And if you are Thai, we also have weekly English courses to help improve your English fluency. Of course, we trust that you already see the benefit of working in a multi-cultural organization.Knowledge – Not Software – Is Our Firm's Competitive AdvantageWant a true perk? We are one of the few SMEs that pays people up to 30K THB per year to continue their education, be it, getting a master's degree, Udacity Nanodegree, or any online courses that the CEO approves of. Knowledge is our firm's competitive advantage. We Dare You to Take Some DrugsInterested? Wanna learn more? Are you ready to be Codiumified? job_title: Back-end Developer for Fast-Growing Fashion-Tech Company
job_responsibilities: ['Are you good at crunching numbers? Are you a programming wizard? Want to be part of a rapidly growing fashion-tech company disrupting the future of the fashion industry?About BespokifyAt Bespokify, we specialise in creating cutting-edge technology that will power the future of the fashion industry. Whether it’s algorithms that create custom-fitted garments, eCommerce integration, enhances to production processes, or machine learning for apparel identification, we’re constantly innovating to move the industry forward.We work with the largest apparel companies in the world toeliminate returns due to bad fit, overproduction, and environmental & labour exploitation. Welcome to the future of fashion.Job ResponsibilitiesWe’re looking for a Back-end Developer to join our team. Your responsibilities will include:Build APIs and develop back-end systems.Participate in R&D of new technologies and solutions.Participate in the entire product lifecycle process.Write quality code that is easy to maintain and is flexible for future changes.Participate in the formulation of technical specification documents.']

']

job_description: Main Responsibilities / Accountabilities:Engaging with product owners, architects and other specialists you'll design world-class solutions to address our customer needs.You'll build and maintain efficient, reusable, reliable and secure code based on User Stories.Working within a multi-functional agile team, you'll develop enterprise software, adhering to company standards and established software methodology.Demonstrating a consistent focus on quality, you'll ensure that your team delivers reliable, robust software through the creation and execution of automated tests.You'll provide technical support to operations or other development teamsTo help the teams develop and learn, you'll review work of peers and more junior developers, providing advice and guidance to benefit the team as a whole.Through agile retrospectives and reviews, you'll inspect and adapt, finding innovative ways to make your team work more effectively.Through participation in refinement and planning sessions, you'll work with other team members to analyze development requirements, provide design options and complexity estimates, and agree how to deliver the requirements.Actively participating in Scrum and Nexus meetings, you'll give timely status updates on areas for which you are responsible.Essential Skills/Experience Required:Experienced software engineer with familiarity with JavaScript, Python, AWS services.Solid technical background with understanding of programming styles, frameworks, design patterns and unit testing.Understanding of security implications and secure codingProven strong communication skills, both verbal and writtenSkill for writing clean, readable code and reusable componentsFamiliar with CI / CD

job_description: ติดต่อทางไลน์ได้เลยค๊าบ ID: Chitianan_win#ติดต่อได้ทั้งเสาร์และอาทิตย์คุณสมบัติประสบการณ์การทำงานขั้นต่ำ 3 ปีเขียนภาษา PHP (Web App,Web API) มีประสบการณ์ในการใช้ Laravel หรือCodeIgniter เชี่ยวชาญด้าน JavaScript, HTML, CSS หากได้ Node.JS และ Vue.js/Angular จะดีมากคับ ใช้SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL คุ้นเคยกับการทำ Unit Test,GIT, CI/CD หากเคยทำMicro-Service, Performance Tuning, Payment Gateway, GraphQL, MongoDB, Redis หรือ Functional Programming จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสวัสดิการเราเป็น Startup น้องใหม่ แต่โปรดักซ์เราน่าสนใจมาก ตีตลาดช่วงนี้ได้แน่นอน ทีมของเราดี มีแต่ Young Gen, Young Blood ทำงานเป็นทีม เพื่อนดีดี มีประกันกลุ่มให้ มีทริปท่องเที่ยว เลือกเวลาทำงานได้ แบบยืดหยุ่น
